resources.string: The High King of Skyrim has been murdered. In the midst, a far more dangerous, ancient evil is awakened.
The High King of Skyrim has been murdered. In the midst, a far more dangerous, ancient evil is awakened.
Skyrim revolutionizes the open-world fantasy epic, bringing to life a complete virtual world open for you to explore.
Battle dragons like you have never seen. As Dragonborn, learn their harness and power for yourself.

Play any type of character you can imagine, and do whatever you want; it comes to life like never before. Choose from hundreds of weapons, spells, and abilities. The new character system allows you to play any way you want and define yourself through your actions.
The High King of Skyrim has been murdered. In the midst, a far more dangerous, ancient evil is awakened.

Skyrim is the Northern province, home of the Nords. After the Crisis of Oblivion 200 years ago, their worship of Talos, the Empire-maker, the Man-God, is now banned by Elf-controlled council. With the death of High King Torygg, the flood gates of civil war break loose, and brothers are slaying brothers across the frozen tundras and rocky crags.
A great prophecy has been foretold in the Elder Scrolls; one that foretells the return of Tamriel’s primeval darkness, the Dragons.

The scrolls also tell of the coming of a mortal born with the soul of a dragon, the "Dovahkiin" or Dragonborn. One who will have the power to permanently defeat his greatest foe and end the dark reign of the consumer of worlds: Alduin.
Now great adventurer, free yourself from bondage; take up blade or spell, bow or axe; fulfill your destiny or watch as the world ends around you. Welcome to the land of heroes and deities, Skyrim.
